title: Arugula & Lentil Bistro Salad
description: Elegant bistro-style salad with French lentils, arugula, apple, and walnuts
ingredients: 1 cup dry French green lentils (or Unico brown lentils)
4–5 cups arugula (a big handful per serving)
1 medium apple, thinly sliced or cubed
⅓ cup goat cheese or blue cheese crumbles
1 tsp honey (optional but nice with apple)
instructions: Cook lentils: If using dry French lentils, simmer in salted water with bay leaf ~20–25 min until just tender. If using Unico brown lentils (dry), simmer ~18–20 min, check early so they don't get mushy. If using canned Unico lentils, just drain & rinse. Drain and cool slightly.
Make dressing: In a small jar or bowl, whisk olive oil, balsamic, Dijon, honey, salt, and pepper until emulsified.
Assemble salad: Add arugula to a large bowl. Toss in warm (or room temp) lentils, apple slices, and walnuts.
Sprinkle goat cheese/blue cheese on top just before serving.
notes: Eat immediately, or keep components separate for meal prep (lentils & dressing hold well for 4 days, arugula/cheese/apple add fresh).
